text: Julien Simon-Chautemps (born 14 May 1978) is a French motor racing engineer. He has been race engineer of the Sauber Formula One team since 2017.Simon- Chautemps quitte Renault ==Career== Simon-Chautemps is a graduate of the French Institut polytechnique des sciences avancées (2002). He started his career as Technical Director of Prema Powerteam (2003-2007) and then to Trident Racing (2007). He moved to Formula One in 2007. From 2007-2010 he was race engineer to Jarno Trulli at Toyota and Lotus. In 2011 he moved to Renault,Lotus Renault GP recrute Julien Simon-Chautemps and was engineer to Vitaly Petrov, Kimi Räikkönen, Pastor Maldonado, Romain GrosjeanGrosjean gets new engineer for 2015 and Jolyon Palmer. In 2017, Simon-Chautemps moved to Sauber.F1: Simon-Chautemps signe chez Sauber ==References== ==External links== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Institut Polytechnique des Sciences Avancées alumni Category:French motorsport people Category:French automotive engineers Category:Formula One people Category:Formula One engineers Category:Renault people Category:Alfa Romeo people
title: Julien Simon-Chautemps
